Hi I’m Deighne [Dane Dickerson for legal purposes].

Bio

I grew up in Salt Lake and moved to Central Arkansas in 2022. I spend ample time being an ebike dad, marketing guy, annoying lefty internet guy, and camera guy. This site’s a portal for most of the things I get up to on the internet.

Work

Right now I’m working as the Digital Marketing lead for Human Element in Ann Arbor, Michigan. Email me at ddickerson@human-element.com for ecommerce marketing work, speaking engagements, and rants about trademark law. One time I made a weekly update video with an ML-generated Guy Fieri, and it was not good. I’ve worked in-house, agency, venture capital, startups, and franchise marketing over the last 10 years; here’s my intermittently updated LinkedIn.

Photos

Most of my photography I’m proud of is on Instagram @theperfectfruitmadrid, but less compressed copies can be found in this Google Photos album. I miss when Flickr was cool. I will take photos in exchange for not much money.

I may write some long-form stuff here once in a while?
